Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsJuly 22 2010 3:04 am I found this video file while clearing up memory in my camera in september.I dont remember filming this.Though I do rememeber filming somthing then deleting it and saying was just the reflection.maybe it was this.I made sure it got deleted off my camera....So what ever this is,is Not a reflection. I have rewatched this again and again to make sure it is not reflection as you will see in the video. At The Start it stays in place even when i moved the camera as you can see. 19 secs into filming it moves to the left out of view and only half is visble. 39 secs it filming it makes a droping motion going down and up and then when the bang sound happens it moves to the right. 1.AT Nights always at computer 2.I dont recall 3.Dont remember but must have been reflection or video would have been longer. 4.Looked a spinning fireball moving left and then moving down and up then moves right. 5.Dont remember 6.Dont remember
